import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";

import { Badges } from '../src/component/docs/apiDocs/Badges';

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Disable user</h1><Badges badges={["self-hosted"]} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v2/administration/users/{userId}/disable"}></MethodEndpoint>



Disables user account. User will not be able to log in, but their user data will be preserved, so you can enable the user later using the `enable` endpoint.

## Request
